CABLE ADDRESS INTERFAX
30 December 1958
Dear Mr. Underwood:
I am sending you for audition purposes a tape of an
informal discussion program, LATIN AMERICA VIEWS THE UNITED
NATIONS produced under the auspices of the Carnegie Endowment.
This is a sequel to the program BRITAIN VIEWS THE UNITED NATIONS
which was distributed to the NAEB network last September. It is based
on the same series of Endowment publications.
Enclosed is a copy of the opening and closing an¬
nouncements and flyer concerning the relevant material which will
provide the necessary background information. A somewhat shorter
version of this program was broadcast on WNYC on December 28th.
We should of course be pleased if you would find it suitable for distri¬
bution to the NAEB network.
Thank you for your consideration. With best regards.
Director of Public Relations
Mr. Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
